data.title: Arun Nayar for Microsoft Dynamics partner of the year
data.meta_description: I stumbled onto a great way to tie the Elizabeth Hurley-Arun Nayar wedding of the year in with Microsoft Dynamics. I kid you not.
data.text:
With my ZDNet blogging colleagues finding ways to mention everyone from Anna Nicole Smith, to porn star Stormy Daniels, in recent blog posts, I figured it was time to find some way to bring some star firepower to "All About Microsoft."

Lucky me: I stumbled onto a great way to tie the Elizabeth Hurley-Arun Nayar wedding of the year in with Microsoft Dynamics.

I kid you not. Nayar, I discovered via a quick Wikipedia search, is co-founder and CEO of Direction Software Solutions. Direction Software is a Microsoft certified partner. Its specialty is ERP consulting, specifically Dynamics/NAV (Navision) work.

If Nayar weren't honeymooning next week, he'd make a fine keynoter for Microsoft's Convergence Conference in San Diego, I'd say.

OK. That's it for me on StarWatch. Back to our regularly scheduled geeky programming....
